updated_cases.title: Sending Block Traffic to Check Transaction Event with Domain Fronting Exception (w/o Hitting Exception List)
updated_cases.custom_summary: Sending Block Traffic to Check Transaction Event with Domain Fronting Exception (w/o Hitting Exception List)
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Enabling domain fronting with API
2. Enabling domain fronting exception manually
3. Send HTTPRequest (SNI and host mismatch)
4. Didn't hit the exception list 
5. Event Field "x-cs-ssl-engine-action" should be "Block"
6. Event Field "x-cs-ssl-engine-action-reason" should be "Domain Fronting Detected"
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1. "x-cs-ssl-engine-action" should be "Block"
2. "x-cs-ssl-engine-action-reason" should be "Domain Fronting Detected"

updated_cases.title: Sending Block Traffic to Check Transaction Event with Domain Fronting Exception (w/ Hitting Exception List)
updated_cases.custom_summary: Sending Block Traffic to Check Transaction Event with Domain Fronting Exception (w/ Hitting Exception List)
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Enabling domain fronting with API
2. Enabling domain fronting exception manually
3. Send HTTPRequest (SNI and host mismatch)
4. Hit the exception list 
5. Event Field "x-cs-ssl-engine-action" should be ""
6. Event Field "x-cs-ssl-engine-action-reason" should be ""

updated_cases.title: Sending Bypass Traffic to Check Transaction Event without Domain Fronting Exception
updated_cases.custom_summary: Sending Bypass Traffic to Check Transaction Event without Domain Fronting Exception
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Enabling domain fronting with API
2. Disabling domain fronting exception manually
3. Send HTTPRequest (SNI and host match)
4. Event Field "x-cs-ssl-engine-action" should be ""
5. Event Field "x-cs-ssl-engine-action-reason" should be ""

updated_cases.title: Sending Block Traffic to Check Transaction Event without Domain Fronting Exception
updated_cases.custom_summary: Sending Block Traffic to Check Transaction Event without Domain Fronting Exception
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Enabling domain fronting with API
2. Disabling domain fronting exception manually
3. Send HTTPRequest (SNI and host mismatch)
4. Event Field "x-cs-ssl-engine-action" should be ""
5. Event Field "x-cs-ssl-engine-action-reason" should be ""

updated_cases.title: Removing Profile After the Traffic Hit the List and Pass Through the Proxy
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Make sure the global feature flag in feature_config.json is enable
2. Enabling per tenant domain fronting exception API by feature flag
3. Make sure URL is not in ns_domain_fronting_exception.json (Global)
4. Check the profile which should contain a list named called "99" is in domain_fronting.json by "GET profile API" 
(File location: /opt/ns/tenant/{Tenant-ID}/domain_fronting.json)
5. Add testing URL1 to {list-id}.json by "UPDATE generic list API"
(File location: /opt/ns/tenant/{tenant-id}/generic-lists/domain/{list-id}.json)
6. Send HTTP Request (SNI and URL1 mismatch)
7. Hitting the per tenant exception list
8. Traffic should not be blocked
9. Remove the domain fronting profile by "DEL profile API"
10. Traffic should be blocked

updated_cases.title: Removing List After the Traffic Hit the List and Pass Through the Proxy
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Make sure the global feature flag in feature_config.json is enable
2. Enabling per tenant domain fronting exception API by feature flag
3. Make sure URL is not in ns_domain_fronting_exception.json (Global)
4. Check the profile which should contain a list named called "99" is in domain_fronting.json by "GET profile API" 
(File location: /opt/ns/tenant/{Tenant-ID}/domain_fronting.json)
5. Add testing URL1 to {list-id}.json by "UPDATE generic list API"
(File location: /opt/ns/tenant/{tenant-id}/generic-lists/domain/{list-id}.json)
6. Send HTTP Request (SNI and URL1 mismatch)
7. Hitting the per tenant exception list
8. Traffic should not be blocked
9. Remove the domain fronting list by "DEL generic list API"
10. Traffic should be blocked

updated_cases.title: Domain Fronting Exception List with Wildcard
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Make sure the global feature flag in feature_config.json is enable
2. Enabling per tenant domain fronting exception API by feature flag
3. Make sure URL is not in ns_domain_fronting_exception.json (Global)
4. Check the profile which should contain a list named called "99" is in domain_fronting.json by "GET profile API" 
(File location: /opt/ns/tenant/{Tenant-ID}/domain_fronting.json)
5. Add testing URL1 which contain wildcard to {list-id}.json by "UPDATE generic list API" (/24, /16, and /18)
(File location: /opt/ns/tenant/{tenant-id}/generic-lists/domain/{list-id}.json)
6. Send HTTP/2 Request (SNI and URL1 mismatch)
7. Hitting the per tenant exception list
8. Traffic should not be blocked

updated_cases.title: Updating Domain Fronting Profile to Add a New URL in the New Generic List
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Make sure the global feature flag in feature_config.json is enable
2. Enabling per tenant domain fronting exception API by feature flag
3. Make sure URL is not in ns_domain_fronting_exception.json (Global)
4. Check the profile which should contain a list named called "99" is in domain_fronting.json by "GET profile API" 
(File location: /opt/ns/tenant/{Tenant-ID}/domain_fronting.json)
5. Add testing URL1 to 99.json by "UPDATE generic list API"
(File location: /opt/ns/tenant/{tenant-id}/generic-lists/domain/{list-id}.json)
6. Send HTTP Request (SNI and URL2 mismatch)
7. Didn't hit the per tenant exception list
8. Traffic should be blocked
9. Update the profile by adding a new list called "100" by "UPDATE profile API"
10. Add testing URL2 to 100.json by "CREATE generic list API"
11. Send HTTP Request (SNI and URL2 mismatch)
12. Hitting the per tenant exception list
13. Traffic should not be blocked
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Traffic should be blocked at step 8
Traffic should not be blocked at step 13

updated_cases.title: Try to Create a great number of Generic List on one Tenant
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Make sure the global feature flag in feature_config.json is enable
2. Enabling per tenant domain fronting exception API by feature flag
3. Update the profile by adding new lists called "101, 102, ..., 110" by "UPDATE domain fronting profile API"
4. There should be an error meesage shows that "only 5 generic lists accepted for each tenant"
5. Check the corresponding file name by "GET generic list API"
(File location: /opt/ns/tenant/{tenant-id}/generic-lists/domain/{list-id}.json)
6. There should be only 5 lists

updated_cases.title: Try to Create a Large Generic List File on one Tenant (>16MB)
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Make sure the global feature flag in feature_config.json is enable
2. Enabling per tenant domain fronting exception API by feature flag
3. Update the profile by adding new lists called "1000" by "UPDATE profile API"
4. There should be an error meesage shows that "the oversize file (>16MB) is not accepted"
5. Check the corresponding file name by "GET generic list API"
(File location: /opt/ns/tenant/{tenant-id}/generic-lists/domain/{list-id}.json)
6. The list "1000" should not be found
updated_cases.custom_expected: The list "1000" should not be found
